Any bigger NVMe plans available on our website can be ordered with double RAM and bandwidth, if paid quarterly or higher. Only in Los Angeles.


Add an additional IP on any of the above plans for $4 per year. Only available with the initial setup.


Notes:

1. These plans are non-customisable and non-refundable.
2. These plans cannot be used to replace any existing service. They cannot be used to upgrade any existing service. These are only for new services provisioned between 25th December and 1st January.
3. Smaller storage plans are not possible, but it is possible to combine multiple of the storage plans -only- at the setup time.
4. 24 hours setup time.


 These are available till 1st January. We will not be doing any promotions of this level till the next Black Friday. We will not be able to provide these after 1st January (no exceptions).


To order, please login to manage.hosthatch.com, go to the billing tab, add credit of the appropriate amount and open a ticket with sales mentioning the promotion/location. Your server will be setup within 24 hours.

Merry Christmas everyone! :)
